name: qr-saas-platform
description: QR Code SaaS Platform with Microservices Architecture

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:qr" "npm run dev:analytics" "npm run dev:file" "npm run dev:notification"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:services
scripts.build:services: concurrently "cd services/api-gateway && npm run build" "cd services/user-service && npm run build" "cd services/qr-service && npm run build" "cd services/analytics-service && npm run build" "cd services/file-service && npm run build" "cd services/notification-service && npm run build"
scripts.test: npm run test:shared && npm run test:services
scripts.test:services: concurrently "cd services/api-gateway && npm run test" "cd services/user-service && npm run test" "cd services/qr-service && npm run test" "cd services/analytics-service && npm run test" "cd services/file-service && npm run test" "cd services/notification-service && npm run test"
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:services && npm run setup:shared
scripts.setup:services: cd services/api-gateway && npm install && cd ../user-service && npm install && cd ../qr-service && npm install && cd ../analytics-service && npm install && cd ../file-service && npm install && cd ../notification-service && npm install

author: QR SaaS Team
